org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate

  • Packages that use ConfigurationUpdate 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.io
    I/O related components built on top of the core package.
    org.jgrapes.net
    Networking related I/O classes.
    org.jgrapes.util
    Utility components that are too small to deserve individual libraries/projects.
    org.jgrapes.util.events  

    • Uses of ConfigurationUpdate in org.jgrapes.io

      Methods in org.jgrapes.io with parameters of type ConfigurationUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void InputStreamMonitor.onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event)
      The component can be configured with events that include a path (see @link paths()) that matches this components path (see Manager.path()).

    • Uses of ConfigurationUpdate in org.jgrapes.util.events

      Subclasses of ConfigurationUpdate in org.jgrapes.util.events 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InitialPreferences
      A special ConfigurationUpdate event that is used by the PreferencesStore for reporting the configuration on startup.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.util.events that return ConfigurationUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfigurationUpdate ConfigurationUpdate.add(String path, String key, String value)
      Add new (updated) configuration value to the event.
      ConfigurationUpdate ConfigurationUpdate.removePath(String path)
      Remove a path from the configuration.
